user.title: Choose Configuration Mode
user.description: Select how you want to configure the cover.

migrate_yaml.title: Migrate YAML Configuration to UI
migrate_yaml.description:
This will migrate {device_count} cover(s) from your YAML configuration to UI configuration entries.

After migration:
- You can manage covers through the UI
- Changes take effect without restarting Home Assistant
- You can safely remove the YAML configuration
- Entity IDs will remain the same

Do you want to proceed with the migration?

device_config.title: Configure Cover
device_config.description: Set up your time-based cover configuration.

data_description.travelling_time_down: Time in seconds for the cover to fully close
data_description.travelling_time_up: Time in seconds for the cover to fully open
data_description.tilting_time_down: Time in seconds to tilt slats fully down
data_description.tilting_time_up: Time in seconds to tilt slats fully up
data_description.command_delay: Delay between command sent and motor start (for RF devices)
data_description.send_stop_at_ends: Send stop command when reaching fully open/closed positions
data_description.always_confident: Always treat position as confident (no uncertainty)
data_description.tilt_only_when_closed: Only allow tilt commands when cover is fully closed
data_description.stop_script_entity_id: Fallback stop script for wrapper mode if cover entity doesn't support stop
data_description.cover_entity_id: Existing cover entity to wrap (for wrapper/hybrid mode)
data_description.availability_template: Template to determine cover availability (e.g. {{ is_state('binary_sensor.rf_bridge', 'on') }})

error.missing_scripts: All three main scripts (open, close, stop) are required for script mode.
error.missing_cover_entity: Cover entity is required for wrapper mode.
